verses.name: Isaiah 49:1
verses.text: Listen, O isles, unto me; and hearken, ye people, from far; The Lord hath called me from the womb; from the bowels of my mother hath he made mention of my name.

verses.name: Isaiah 49:2
verses.text: And he hath made my mouth like a sharp sword; in the shadow of his hand hath he hid me, and made me a polished shaft; in his quiver hath he hid me;

verses.name: Isaiah 49:3
verses.text: And said unto me, Thou art my servant, O Israel, in whom I will be glorified.
